#  After mobility -- Department for International Students AGH 

URL: https://www.international.agh.edu.pl/en/exchange/after-mobility
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:19:57

Skip to content

Skip to footer

 After mobility 

Before leaving, do not forget to collect ending documents from Department for International Students.
 We can issue them to you in person, also send via email to partner universities:

 Transcript of Records 

The final results of your studies are prepared by us on official Transcript of Records.  
 You can check your grades on a regular basis via the AGH USOS Service.

The dates of the exam session are published one year in advance in the academic calendar.
Exam dates are set by individual lecturers.   

 Confirmation of Stay 

All home universities require their students to confirm the period of stay at a partner university in the form of the so-called Certificate of Stay / Confirmation of Stay. As with confirmation of arrival, if you need such a document you should deliver to the Department for International Students a form from your university.
